name: places/ChIJo79HQzZZwokR-dHnXnh8pcI
formattedAddress: 137 Rivington St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 137 Rivington St, New York, NY 10002-2431, USA

originalText.text: Anastasia always does a phenomenal job with my hair! She was the first person I trusted with doing my first coloring job, and she took the time to make me feel comfortable about a fairly drastic color change, made sure I was totally satisfied before I left, and educated me about aftercare. Her rates are super fair for her quality of work and expertise. Other people who color their hair often have told me the ash blonde balayage she did on my hair was well done and typically hard to achieve! On top of that she is always very warm and sweet. I’ll be scheduling my fourth session with her soon and won’t be going to anyone else!

originalText.text: This review is overdue! I love Anastasia. For years, I have bounced around all over the city for exactly what she is, THE HAIR PAINTER. Been loyal for a couple of years now because she gets the color right, the blend makes transition last longer, most importantly my hair is NOT damaged! Love that she’s practically at my backyard but I will follow her.

text.text: This review is overdue! I love Anastasia. For years, I have bounced around all over the city for exactly what she is, THE HAIR PAINTER. Been loyal for a couple of years now because she gets the color right, the blend makes transition last longer, most importantly my hair is NOT damaged! Love that she’s practically at my backyard but I will follow her.

originalText.text:
Coming to the Hair Painters is always such a pleasure. Anastasia opened her studio about a year ago and works here by herself, so there's something nice about not having to be thrown into the chaos that comes with larger studios catering to multiple clients simultaneously. Not only does she really understand hospitality, but she's also so genuinely nice and interesting to talk to if you ask about her story! She offers coffee and WiFi for those that wish to work remotely while getting their hair done, and even lets me store my bike upstairs so I don't have to leave it on the street. The space is clean, modern, relaxing. It's kind of my dream setup.

Anastasia's craft is evident in her work. I've seen her twice now, and she's always very receptive as far as the color I'm seeking, but is realistic about what's achievable. The first time I went to her, she gave me a silver balayage, and the second time, we went with more of a lavender/silver color; both services took about 3.5-4 hours.

originalText.text: Anastasia is amazing. She explained to me the science behind colouring and what my thick black hair to have nice blended highlights with beautiful shades. She was meticulous and my hair came out amazing. First time I actually got the exact colours I wanted!! I’ve tried so many different hair stylist in the city and she’s the best!

She was meticulous and my hair came out amazing. First time I actually got the exact colours I wanted!! I’ve tried so many different hair stylist in the city and she’s the best!

originalText.text: Anastasia is a skilled hairdresser and lovely person to chat with. I highly recommend her services for a truly bespoke service!
